headline: Daphna Edwards Ziman on Project Rise Paramount Deal and New Song “Humanity” – Josh Kosman Video Interview
summary: CorpGov’s Josh Kosman interviewed Daphna Edwards Ziman, who is leading the Project Rise effort to buy Paramount Global, which is due to be acquired by Skydance Media this week. They discussed the tactics of Skydance, led by David Ellison (son of tech mogul Larry Ellison), Chinese influence on media, the role of AI in a […] The post Daphna Edwards Ziman on Project Rise Paramount Deal and New Song “Humanity” – Josh Kosman Video Interview appeared first on CorpGov.
